name: Stay with Fun Family (queen size bed)
neighborhood_overview: Our house is located near Milton Station or Central av station on Red line trolley. You can also take the bus from Ashmount station (only 4 stops) and it will drop you off 5 houses down from our place. There are supermarket, restaurants, ice cream shop, pizza shops, drug store and the library all in walking distance (all in 2 - 5 minutes). There's a beautiful trail that you can walk and get some exercise on.
description:
Hello!!
My name is Yuki, my husband and I are both teachers in Boston Public Schools. (By the way , my video went Viral back in 2015. Have you seen a pregnant woman in the orange dress dancing through labor?? That's me!!!!)

The space
We have hosted exchange students from Turkey, Mexico, Columbia, Saudi Arabia, France, Korea, China, Russia, Germany, Japan, Holland, Belgium and England. We really love having such nice companies at home! We have a 6 year old girl and a 4 year old boy. My daughter loves meeting new people and hanging out with them ;) My son is a bit shy but once he gets used to you he won't leave you alone ( just kidding. He's such a mommy's boy.lol)
We used to travel a lot, we are very open minded and understanding of different cultures/ customs!!!

Guest access
You're welcomed to use our kitchen as long as you clean after yourself. You will be sharing the bathroom with another guest.

Other things to n

name: Stay with Fun Family ( twin size bed)
neighborhood_overview: Lower Mills area is getting nicer and fancier. The new trail from Milton to mattapan square has opened this summer, new restaurants, cafe, etc.... We have a wonderful neighborhood.
description:
My place is close to Dunkin' Donuts, The Ice Creamsmith, ester, and Sweet Life Bakery & Café. You’ll love my place because of easy access to the transportation, the high ceilings, the coziness. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers.

The space
The area that we live is called lower mills. Theres a beautiful trail along side of the trolley line.

Guest access
We have a washer and a dryer for you to use. All you need to purchase is a laundry detergent :)

Other things to note
We try to keep our house tidy. We also have a cleaning ladies come every two weeks !

name: A minute walk from the Red Line (Shawmut) Room 3
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to Ashmont Station, where there are popular restaurants (Italian, American, and Mexican restaurants). America’s food basket and Daily table are a few of my favorite grocery stores! You can walk through the Codman square.
description:
Steps away from the Red Line Shawmut station!!!! Close the the Codman square, where there are Drugstore, grocery store and some fast food restaurants. You can also walk to the Ashmont station where there are few top rated restaurants. 6 stops to South Station, and 7 stops to Downtown Crossing. Great for college students and young professionals!!!

The space
Common area : Living room, kitchen, shared bathroom

Guest access
Washer and the dryer in the basement. You will have an extra linens, but please wash it when necessary. You’ll be responsible for washing your linens and towels.

Other things to note
We have a hot water tank, which could run out if you take an extra long shower.... Please be cognizant of other house mate.
